Name: 存仓库货位扫码扣减结余

ExternalDatabaseInfo.SourceTableName: 存仓库货位扫码扣减结余
ExternalDatabaseInfo.CreateViewSql:
SELECT  a.cInvCode, a.cPosCode, a.cWhCode, a.库存余数 - ISNULL(b.扫码占用数, 0) AS 扫描可用数
FROM      (SELECT  cWhCode, cWhName, cPosCode, cPosName, cInvCode, SUM(现存量) AS 库存余数
                   FROM       dbo.货位存量表
                   GROUP BY cWhCode, cWhName, cPosCode, cPosName, cInvCode) AS a LEFT OUTER JOIN
                       (SELECT  cinvcode, invpostion, cwhcode, SUM(scanqty) AS 已扫描数, SUM(scanqty * (1 - ISNULL(扫描出库比例, 0))) 
                                           AS 扫码占用数
                        FROM       dbo.scandetail
                        WHERE    (ISNULL(扫描出库比例, 0) < 1)
                        GROUP BY cinvcode, invpostion, cwhcode) AS b ON a.cInvCode = b.cinvcode AND a.cPosCode = b.invpostion AND 
                   a.cWhCode = b.cwhcode

ViewInfo.ViewName: 存仓库货位扫码扣减结余
